issue.title: [C++][Compute] Remove duplicate ThreadIndexer definition
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14382](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14382). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11350 moved ThreadIndexer to a header file to allow usage from the join node and incremented its capacity. We should have a single definition and the incremented capacity is a simple fix for nightly failures such as https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3938882073#step:7:2363
